name: MIFF XR
summary: With thanks to the immense generosity of Major Supporter Ling Ang, MIFF presents a reimagined XR program on a world-class online platform available globally for free. Enter the mind of the world’s greatest con man in the AR piece Fortune! by Brett Gaylor, Nicolas Bourniquel and Arnaud Colinart. Charlotte Rampling guides you through underwater caves filled with bioluminescent creatures in Abel Kohen’s Biolum. A young boy uncovers family secrets in an intricate, Tim Burton–esque world built by German...
